en.bdb: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
God himself created the true Guru Nanak.
Becoming Sikh of the Guru, Guru Angad joined this family.

verse.gurmukhi: gurisKu hY gur Amru siqgur BwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਸਿਖੁ ਹੈ ਗੁਰ ਅਮਰੁ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਭਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Liked by the true Guru, Guru Amar Das became Sikh of the Guru.

transliteration.english: gursikh hai gur amar satigur bhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरसिखु है गुर अमरु सतिगुर भाइआ।
transliteration.en: gursikh hai gur amar satigur bhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरसिखु है गुर अमरु सतिगुर भाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəsɪkʰ hæ Gʊr əmər sət̪ɪGʊr ɓɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرسکھ هَے گُر امر ستگر بھاایا۔

en.bdb: Then Ram Das, the Sikh of the Guru came to be known as the Guru.
Thereafter came Guru Arjan as the disciple of the Guru (and got established as the Guru).
Hargobind, the Sikh of the Guru cannot remain concealed even if somebody wishes to (and this further means that all the Gurus had the same light).
All the Gurus had the same light
The Gurmukh (Guru Nanak) by becoming the philosopher's stone made all the disciples venerable.

verse.gurmukhi: Ast Dwqu ieku Dwqu joiq jgwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਅਸਟ ਧਾਤੁ ਇਕੁ ਧਾਤੁ ਜੋਤਿ ਜਗਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: He illumined the people of all the varnas as the philosopher's stone converts all the right metals into gold.

transliteration.english: asaT dhaat ik dhaat jot jagaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: असट धातु इकु धातु जोति जगाइआ।
transliteration.en: asaT dhaat ik dhaat jot jagaiaa|
transliteration.hi: असट धातु इकु धातु जोति जगाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: əsəʈ t̪ɑt̪ eɪk t̪ɑt̪ d͡ʒɔt̪ d͡ʒəGɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: اسٹ دھات اک دھات جوت جگاایا۔

en.bdb: By becoming sandalwood he made all the trees fragrant.

verse.gurmukhi: gurisKu isKu gur hoie Acrju idKwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਸਿਖੁ ਸਿਖੁ ਗੁਰ ਹੋਇ ਅਚਰਜੁ ਦਿਖਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: He accomplished the wonder of making disciple the Guru.

transliteration.english: gursikh sikh gur hoi acharaj dhikhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरसिखु सिखु गुर होइ अचरजु दिखाइआ।
transliteration.en: gursikh sikh gur hoi acharaj dhikhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरसिखु सिखु गुर होइ अचरजु दिखाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəsɪkʰ sɪkʰ Gʊr hɔeɪ ət͡ʃərəd͡ʒ d̪ɪkʰɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرسکھ سکھ گُر هوا اچرج دکھاایا۔

en.bdb: Extended his light similarly as a lamp is lit by another lamp.
As the water mixing with water becomes one, likewise deleting ego, the Sikh merges into the Guru.
The gurmukh
The life of that Gurmukh is successful who has met the true Guru.
The Gurmukh who has surrendered before the Guru is a blest one and his fate is perfect one.
The true Guru, by giving him place around his feet has made him remember the name (of the Lord).

verse.gurmukhi: Gr hI ivic audwsu n ivAwpY mwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਘਰ ਹੀ ਵਿਚਿ ਉਦਾਸੁ ਨ ਵਿਆਪੈ ਮਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Now being detached, he remains at home and maya does not affect him.

transliteration.english: ghar hee vich udhaas na viaapai maiaa|
transliteration.hindi: घर ही विचि उदासु न विआपै माइआ।
transliteration.en: ghar hee vich udhaas na viaapai maiaa|
transliteration.hi: घर ही विचि उदासु न विआपै माइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʰər hi ʋɪt͡ʃ oʊd̪ɑs nə ʋɪəɑpæ mɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گھر هیِ وچ اُداس ن وآپَے ماایا۔

en.bdb: By putting into practice the teachings of the Guru, he has realised he invisible Lord.
Losing his ego, the Guru-orientated Gurmukh has become liberated though still embodied.
The Gurmukhs only sustain the anbearable cup of love

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK Awp gvwie n Awpu gxwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਆਪ ਗਵਾਇ ਨ ਆਪੁ ਗਣਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The Gurmukhs erase their ego and never allow themselves to be noticed.

transliteration.english: gurmukh aap gavai na aap ganaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि आप गवाइ न आपु गणाइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh aap gavai na aap ganaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि आप गवाइ न आपु गणाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ əɑp Gəʋɑeɪ nə əɑp Gəɳɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ آپ گواا ن آپ گݨاایا۔

en.bdb: Effacing duality, they venerate only one Lord.
Accepting Guru as God they by cultivating the words of the Guru, translate them into life.
The Gurmukhs serve and attain the fruits of happiness.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK kwr kmwie suK Plu pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਕਾਰ ਕਮਾਇ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: This way receiving the cup of love,

transliteration.english: gurmukh kaar kamai sukh fal paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि कार कमाइ सुख फलु पाइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh kaar kamai sukh fal paiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि कार कमाइ सुख फलु पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ kɑr kəmɑeɪ sʊkʰ fəl pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ کار کماا سُکھ پھل پاایا۔

en.bdb: They bear the effect of this unbearable in their mind.
Daily routine of the Gurmukh
The Guru-orientated gets up early in the morning and makes others also to do so.
Discarding delusions is equal to bathing at the holy places for him.
Gurmukh carefully and attentively recites the moolmantar.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK inhclu hoie iek min iDAwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਹੋਇ ਇਕ ਮਨਿ ਧਿਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: The Gurmukh single-mindedly concentrates upon the Lord.

transliteration.english: gurmukh nihachal hoi ik man dhiaaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि निहचलु होइ इक मनि धिआइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh nihachal hoi ik man dhiaaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि निहचलु होइ इक मनि धिआइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ nɪhət͡ʃəl hɔeɪ eɪk mən t̪ɪəɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ نهچل هوا اک من دھآایا۔

en.bdb: The red mark of love adorns his forehead.

verse.gurmukhi: pYrI pY gur isK pYrI pwieAw ]5]
verse.unicode: ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਪੈਰੀ ਪਾਇਆ ॥੫॥

en.bdb: Falling on the feet of the Sikhs of the Guru and thus through his own humility, he makes others surrender to his feet.

transliteration.english: pairee pai gur sikh pairee paiaa ||5||
transliteration.hindi: पैरी पै गुर सिख पैरी पाइआ ॥५॥
transliteration.en: pairee pai gur sikh pairee paiaa ||5||
transliteration.hi: पैरी पै गुर सिख पैरी पाइआ ॥५॥
transliteration.ipa: pæri pæ Gʊr sɪkʰ pæri pɑɪɑ.5.
transliteration.ur: پَےریِ پَے گُر سکھ پَےریِ پاایا ۔۔۵۔۔

en.bdb: The earning of Gurmukh
Touching the feet, the Sikhs of the Guru wash their feet.
Then they taste the ambrosial word (of Guru) through which the mind is controlled.
They fetch water, fan the sangat and put wood in the firebox of the kitchen.
They listen to, write and make others write the hymns of the Gurus.
They practice the remembrance of Lords name, charity and ablutions.

verse.gurmukhi: inv clxu imT bol Gwil KvwieAw ]6]
verse.unicode: ਨਿਵ ਚਲਣੁ ਮਿਠ ਬੋਲ ਘਾਲਿ ਖਵਾਇਆ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: They walk in humility, speak sweetly, and eat the earning of their own hands.

transliteration.english: niv chalan miTh bol ghaal khavaiaa ||6||
transliteration.hindi: निव चलणु मिठ बोल घालि खवाइआ ॥६॥
transliteration.en: niv chalan miTh bol ghaal khavaiaa ||6||
transliteration.hi: निव चलणु मिठ बोल घालि खवाइआ ॥६॥
transliteration.ipa: nɪʋ t͡ʃələɳ mɪʈʰ bɔl Gʰɑl kʰəʋɑɪɑ.6.
transliteration.ur: نِو چلݨ مٹھ بول گھال کھواایا ۔۔۶۔۔

en.bdb: Metting of the Sikhs of the Guru
The Sikhs of Guru meet the Sikhs of the Guru.
Bound by the loving devotion, they celebrate the anniversaries of the Guru.
For them, the Sikh of the Guru is the god, goddess and the father.

verse.gurmukhi: gurisK mW ipau vIr kutMb sbwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਮਾਂ ਪਿਉ ਵੀਰ ਕੁਟੰਬ ਸਬਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Mother, father, brother and the family also is the Sikh of the Guru.

transliteration.english: gursikh maa(n) piau veer kuTa(n)b sabaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरसिख माँ पिउ वीर कुटंब सबाइआ।
transliteration.en: gursikh maa(n) piau veer kuTa(n)b sabaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरसिख माँ पिउ वीर कुटंब सबाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəsɪkʰ mɑⁿ pɪo ʋir kʊʈəŋb səbɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرسکھ ماں پا ویِر کُٹںب سباایا۔

en.bdb: Meeting to the Sikhs of the Guru is farming business as well as other gainful occupations for the Sikh.
The progeny of the swan like Sikhs of Guru is also the Sikh of the Guru.
Omens

verse.gurmukhi: sjw Kbw sauxu n mMin vswieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਜਾ ਖਬਾ ਸਉਣੁ ਨ ਮੰਨਿ ਵਸਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The Gurmukhs never take to their heart the omen on the right or the left.

transliteration.english: sajaa khabaa saun na ma(n)n vasaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सजा खबा सउणु न मंनि वसाइआ।
transliteration.en: sajaa khabaa saun na ma(n)n vasaiaa|
transliteration.hi: सजा खबा सउणु न मंनि वसाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: səd͡ʒɑ kʰəbɑ soʊɳ nə məŋn ʋəsɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سجا کھبا ساݨ ن منّ وساایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: nwir purK no vyiK n pYru htwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਨਾਰਿ ਪੁਰਖ ਨੋ ਵੇਖਿ ਨ ਪੈਰੁ ਹਟਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: They do not retrace their steps while seeing a man or woman.

transliteration.english: naar purakh no vekh na pair haTaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: नारि पुरख नो वेखि न पैरु हटाइआ।
transliteration.en: naar purakh no vekh na pair haTaiaa|
transliteration.hi: नारि पुरख नो वेखि न पैरु हटाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: nɑr pʊrəkʰ nɔ ʋekʰ nə pær həʈɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: نار پُرکھ نو وےکھ ن پَےر هٹاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: BwK suBwK vIcwir n iCk mnwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਭਾਖ ਸੁਭਾਖ ਵੀਚਾਰਿ ਨ ਛਿਕ ਮਨਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: They do not pay attention to the crises of animals or sneezing.

transliteration.english: bhaakh subhaakh veechaar na chhik manaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: भाख सुभाख वीचारि न छिक मनाइआ।
transliteration.en: bhaakh subhaakh veechaar na chhik manaiaa|
transliteration.hi: भाख सुभाख वीचारि न छिक मनाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɓɑkʰ sʊɓɑkʰ ʋit͡ʃɑr nə ɕɪk mənɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: بھاکھ سُبھاکھ ویِچار ن چھک مناایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: dyvI dyv n syv n pUj krwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਦੇਵੀ ਦੇਵ ਨ ਸੇਵ ਨ ਪੂਜ ਕਰਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Goddess and gods are neither served nor worshipped by them.

transliteration.english: dhevee dhev na sev na pooj karaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: देवी देव न सेव न पूज कराइआ।
transliteration.en: dhevee dhev na sev na pooj karaiaa|
transliteration.hi: देवी देव न सेव न पूज कराइआ।
transliteration.ipa: d̪eʋi d̪eʋ nə seʋ nə pud͡ʒ kərɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: دےویِ دےو ن سےو ن پُوج کرااآ۔

en.bdb: By not entangling in deceits, they do not allow their minds to wander.
The Gursikhs have sowed the seed of truth in the field of life and have made it fruitful.
Holy congregation, abode the truth

verse.gurmukhi: ikrq ivriq mnu Drmu scu idVwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਕਿਰਤ ਵਿਰਤਿ ਮਨੁ ਧਰਮੁ ਸਚੁ ਦਿੜਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: For earning livelihood, the Gurmukhs keep in mind, the dharma and always remember the truth.

transliteration.english: kirat virat man dharam sach dhiRaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: किरत विरति मनु धरमु सचु दिड़ाइआ।
transliteration.en: kirat virat man dharam sach dhiRaiaa|
transliteration.hi: किरत विरति मनु धरमु सचु दिड़ाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: kɪrət̪ ʋɪrət̪ mən t̪ərəm sət͡ʃ d̪ɪɽɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: کِرت ورت من دھرم سچ دڑاایا۔

en.bdb: They know that the creator himself has created (and diffused) the truth.

verse.gurmukhi: siqgur purKu dieAwlu dieAw kir AwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਦਇਆਲੁ ਦਇਆ ਕਰਿ ਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: That true Guru, the supreme one, compassionately has descended on earth.

transliteration.english: satigur purakh dhiaal dhiaa kar aaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सतिगुर पुरखु दइआलु दइआ करि आइआ।
transliteration.en: satigur purakh dhiaal dhiaa kar aaiaa|
transliteration.hi: सतिगुर पुरखु दइआलु दइआ करि आइआ।
transliteration.ipa: sət̪ɪGʊr pʊrəkʰ d̪ɪɑl d̪ɪɑ kər əɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: ستگر پُرکھ دایال دایا کرِ آایا۔

en.bdb: Personifying the formless into the form of Word He has recited it for one and all.
The Guru has founded the high mound of the holy congregation known also as the abode of truth.
There only establishing the true throne he has made all to bow and salute.
Services to the holy congregation
The Sikhs of the Guru inspire the Sikhs of the Guru to serve.

verse.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq kir syv suK Plu pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਸੇਵ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Serving the holy congregation they receive the fruit of happiness.

transliteration.english: saadhasa(n)gat kar sev sukh fal paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: साधसंगति करि सेव सुख फलु पाइआ।
transliteration.en: saadhasa(n)gat kar sev sukh fal paiaa|
transliteration.hi: साधसंगति करि सेव सुख फलु पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: sɑt̪əsəŋGət̪ kər seʋ sʊkʰ fəl pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سادھسںگت کر سےو سُکھ پھل پاایا۔

en.bdb: Sweeping and spreading the sitting mats they bathe in the dust of the holy congregation.
They bring unused pitchers and fill them with water (to get it cold).
They bring sacred food (maha parshad), distribute it among others and eat.

verse.gurmukhi: 11 : bury nwl Blw krn dy ivKy
verse.unicode: ੧੧ : ਬੁਰੇ ਨਾਲ ਭਲਾ ਕਰਨ ਦੇ ਵਿਖੇ

en.bdb: Do good to evil person

transliteration.english: 11 : bure naal bhalaa karan dhe vikhe
transliteration.hindi: ११ : बुरे नाल भला करन दे विखे
transliteration.en: 11 : bure naal bhalaa karan dhe vikhe
transliteration.hi: ११ : बुरे नाल भला करन दे विखे
transliteration.ipa: 1ə1 : bʊre nɑl ɓəlɑ kərən d̪e ʋɪkʰe
transliteration.ur: ۱۱ : بُرے نال بھلا کرن دے وکھے

en.bdb: Tree is there in the world and keeps its head downward.
It stands steadfast and maintains its head low.

verse.gurmukhi: hoie suPl Pl sPlu vt shwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਹੋਇ ਸੁਫਲ ਫਲ ਸਫਲੁ ਵਟ ਸਹਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Then becoming full of fruits it bears the stone-blows.

transliteration.english: hoi sufal fal safal vaT sahaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: होइ सुफल फल सफलु वट सहाइआ।
transliteration.en: hoi sufal fal safal vaT sahaiaa|
transliteration.hi: होइ सुफल फल सफलु वट सहाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: hɔeɪ sʊfəl fəl səfəl ʋəʈ səhɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: هوا سُپھل پھل سپھل وٹ سهاایا۔

en.bdb: Further it gets sawed and causes to make ship.

verse.gurmukhi: pwxI dy isir vwt rwhu clwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪਾਣੀ ਦੇ ਸਿਰਿ ਵਾਟ ਰਾਹੁ ਚਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Now it moves on the head of water.

transliteration.english: paanee dhe sir vaaT raahu chalaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पाणी दे सिरि वाट राहु चलाइआ।
transliteration.en: paanee dhe sir vaaT raahu chalaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पाणी दे सिरि वाट राहु चलाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: pɑɳi d̪e sɪr ʋɑʈ rɑh t͡ʃəlɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پاݨیِ دے سر واٹ راهُ چلاایا۔

en.bdb: Having borne iron-saw upon head, it carries the same iron (used in ship making) across the water.
The tree bears the evil and does the good
With the help of iron the tree is cut and pruned and iron nails are stuck into it.
But the tree carry iron on its head keeps it floating on water.

verse.gurmukhi: AwpnVw puqu pwil n nIir fubwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਆਪਨੜਾ ਪੁਤੁ ਪਾਲਿ ਨ ਨੀਰਿ ਡੁਬਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The water also considering it its adopted son does not make it sink.

transliteration.english: aapanaRaa put paal na neer ddubaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: आपनड़ा पुतु पालि न नीरि डुबाइआ।
transliteration.en: aapanaRaa put paal na neer ddubaiaa|
transliteration.hi: आपनड़ा पुतु पालि न नीरि डुबाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: əɑpənəɽɑ pʊt̪ pɑl nə nir ɖʊbɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: آپنڑا پُت پال ن نیِر ڈُباایا۔

en.bdb: But the sandalwood is sunk intentionally to make it costlier.

verse.gurmukhi: gux kIqy gux hoie jgu pqIAwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਣ ਕੀਤੇ ਗੁਣ ਹੋਇ ਜਗੁ ਪਤੀਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: The quality of goodness produces goodness and the whole world also remains happy.

transliteration.english: gun keete gun hoi jag pateeaaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुण कीते गुण होइ जगु पतीआइआ।
transliteration.en: gun keete gun hoi jag pateeaaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुण कीते गुण होइ जगु पतीआइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊɳ kit̪e Gʊɳ hɔeɪ d͡ʒəG pət̪iəɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُݨ کیِتے گُݨ هوا جگ پتیِآایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: Avgux sih guxu krY Goil GumwieAw ]12]
verse.unicode: ਅਵਗੁਣ ਸਹਿ ਗੁਣੁ ਕਰੈ ਘੋਲਿ ਘੁਮਾਇਆ ॥੧੨॥

en.bdb: I am sacrifice unto him who does good in return of evil.

transliteration.english: avagun seh gun karai ghol ghumaiaa ||12||
transliteration.hindi: अवगुण सहि गुणु करै घोलि घुमाइआ ॥१२॥
transliteration.en: avagun seh gun karai ghol ghumaiaa ||12||
transliteration.hi: अवगुण सहि गुणु करै घोलि घुमाइआ ॥१२॥
transliteration.ipa: əʋəGʊɳ səh Gʊɳ kəræ Gʰɔl Gʰʊmɑɪɑ.1ə2.
transliteration.ur: اوگݨ سهِ گُݨ کرَے گھول گھُماایا ۔۔۱۲۔۔

en.bdb: Orders of the true Guru
Who accepts the order (will) of Lord makes the whole world accept His order (Hukam).
The order of the Guru is that the will of the Lord be accepted positively.
Drinking the cup of loving devotion, they visualise the invisible (Lord).

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK AlKu lKwie n AlKu lKwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾਇ ਨ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The Gurmukhs even having seen (realised) do not go on divulging this mystery.

transliteration.english: gurmukh alakh lakhai na alakh lakhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि अलखु लखाइ न अलखु लखाइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh alakh lakhai na alakh lakhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि अलखु लखाइ न अलखु लखाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ ələkʰ ləkʰɑeɪ nə ələkʰ ləkʰɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ الکھ لکھاا ن الکھ لکھاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK Awpu gvwie n Awpu gxwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਆਪੁ ਗਵਾਇ ਨ ਆਪੁ ਗਣਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Gurmukhs delete ego from the self and never allow themselves to be noticed.

transliteration.english: gurmukh aap gavai na aap ganaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि आपु गवाइ न आपु गणाइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh aap gavai na aap ganaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि आपु गवाइ न आपु गणाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ əɑp Gəʋɑeɪ nə əɑp Gəɳɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ آپ گواا ن آپ گݨاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu pwie bIj PlwieAw ]13]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਾਇ ਬੀਜ ਫਲਾਇਆ ॥੧੩॥

en.bdb: The Guru-orientated ones acquire the fruit of happiness and spread its seeds all around.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sukh fal pai beej falaiaa ||13||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सुख फलु पाइ बीज फलाइआ ॥१३॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh sukh fal pai beej falaiaa ||13||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सुख फलु पाइ बीज फलाइआ ॥१३॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ sʊkʰ fəl pɑeɪ bid͡ʒ fəlɑɪɑ.1ə3.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سُکھ پھل پاا بیِج پھلاایا ۔۔۱۳۔۔

en.bdb: Love of a disciple
Having the sight of the true Guru, the Sikh of the Guru concentrates upon Him.
Pondering upon the word of true Guru he cultivates knowledge.

verse.gurmukhi: crx kvl gur mMqu iciq vswieAw[
verse.unicode: ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਗੁਰ ਮੰਤੁ ਚਿਤਿ ਵਸਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: He keeps to his heart the mantra and the lotus feet of Guru.

transliteration.english: charan kaval gur ma(n)t chit vasaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: चरण कवल गुर मंतु चिति वसाइआ।
transliteration.en: charan kaval gur ma(n)t chit vasaiaa|
transliteration.hi: चरण कवल गुर मंतु चिति वसाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃərəɳ kəʋəl Gʊr məŋt̪ t͡ʃɪt̪ ʋəsɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: چرݨ کول گُر مںت چت وساایا۔

en.bdb: He serves the true Guru and consequently makes the whole world serve him.
The Guru loves disciple and disciple makes the whole world happy.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pMQu clwie inj Gir CwieAw ]14]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥੁ ਚਲਾਇ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਛਾਇਆ ॥੧੪॥

en.bdb: This way, that disciple creates a religion of the Gurmukhs and situates in his own self.

transliteration.english: gurmukh pa(n)th chalai nij ghar chhaiaa ||14||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि पंथु चलाइ निज घरि छाइआ ॥१४॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh pa(n)th chalai nij ghar chhaiaa ||14||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि पंथु चलाइ निज घरि छाइआ ॥१४॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ pəŋt̪ʰ t͡ʃəlɑeɪ nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər ɕɑɪɑ.1ə4.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پںتھ چلاا نج گھر چھاایا ۔۔۱۴۔۔

en.bdb: Yoga-technique for Gurmukh
Guru has explained the technique of yoga to the Sikhs.
Remain detached amidst all the hopes and cravings.
Eat less food and drink little water.

verse.gurmukhi: QoVw bolx bol n JiK JKwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਥੋੜਾ ਬੋਲਣ ਬੋਲ ਨ ਝਖਿ ਝਖਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Speak less and do not talk nonsensical.

transliteration.english: thoRaa bolan bol na jhakh jhakhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: थोड़ा बोलण बोल न झखि झखाइआ।
transliteration.en: thoRaa bolan bol na jhakh jhakhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: थोड़ा बोलण बोल न झखि झखाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ʰɔɽɑ bɔləɳ bɔl nə ɖ͡ʐəkʰ ɖ͡ʐəkʰɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: تھوڑا بولݨ بول ن جھکھ جھکھااآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: QoVI rwqI nId n moih PhwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਥੋੜੀ ਰਾਤੀ ਨੀਦ ਨ ਮੋਹਿ ਫਹਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Sleep less and do not be caught in any infatuation.

transliteration.english: thoRee raatee needh na moh fahaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: थोड़ी राती नीद न मोहि फहाइआ।
transliteration.en: thoRee raatee needh na moh fahaiaa|
transliteration.hi: थोड़ी राती नीद न मोहि फहाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ʰɔɽi rɑt̪i nid̪ nə mɔh fəhɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: تھوڑیِ راتیِ نیِد ن موه پھهاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: suhxy AMdir jwie n loB luBwieAw ]15]
verse.unicode: ਸੁਹਣੇ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜਾਇ ਨ ਲੋਭ ਲੁਭਾਇਆ ॥੧੫॥

en.bdb: Sleep less and do not be caught in any infatuation.

transliteration.english: suhane a(n)dhar jai na lobh lubhaiaa ||15||
transliteration.hindi: सुहणे अंदरि जाइ न लोभ लुभाइआ ॥१५॥
transliteration.en: suhane a(n)dhar jai na lobh lubhaiaa ||15||
transliteration.hi: सुहणे अंदरि जाइ न लोभ लुभाइआ ॥१५॥
transliteration.ipa: sʊhəɳe əŋd̪ər d͡ʒɑeɪ nə lɔɓ lʊɓɑɪɑ.1ə5.
transliteration.ur: سُهݨے اںدر جاا ن لوبھ لُبھاایا ۔۔۱۵۔۔

en.bdb: Yoga-technique for Gursikhs
The sermon of the Guru is the earrings of a yogi.

verse.gurmukhi: iKMQw iKmw isvwie JolI piq mwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਖਿੰਥਾ ਖਿਮਾ ਸਿਵਾਇ ਝੋਲੀ ਪਤਿ ਮਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Forgiveness is the patched blanket and in the beggar's bad is the name of the Lord of maya (God).

transliteration.english: khi(n)thaa khimaa sivai jholee pat maiaa|
transliteration.hindi: खिंथा खिमा सिवाइ झोली पति माइआ।
transliteration.en: khi(n)thaa khimaa sivai jholee pat maiaa|
transliteration.hi: खिंथा खिमा सिवाइ झोली पति माइआ।
transliteration.ipa: kʰɪŋt̪ʰɑ kʰɪmɑ sɪʋɑeɪ ɖ͡ʐɔli pət̪ mɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: کھِںتھا کھما سواا جھولیِ پت ماایا۔

en.bdb: Humbly touching of the feet ashes.
Cup of love is the bowl, which is filled with the food of affection.
Knowledge is the staff with which the messengers of different propensities of mind are cultured.
Holy congregation is the tranquil cave wherein the yogi resides in equipoise.
Other means of yoga-technique for  Gursikhs
The knowledge about the supreme is the trumpet (singi) of yogi and the recitation of the word is its playing upon.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK AweI pMQu inj Gru AwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਆਈ ਪੰਥੁ ਨਿਜ ਘਰੁ ਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: The best assembly of gurmukhs i.e. the Ai panth, could be attained by settling in one's own home.

transliteration.english: gurmukh aaiee pa(n)th nij ghar aaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि आई पंथु निज घरु आइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh aaiee pa(n)th nij ghar aaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि आई पंथु निज घरु आइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ əɑei pəŋt̪ʰ nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər əɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ آای پںتھ نج گھر آایا۔

en.bdb: Such people (Gurmukhs) bow before the primal Lord and have the sight of the invisible (God).
The disciples and the Gurus have enrapt themselves in the mutual love for one another.
Getting above of the worldly affairs, they meet (their ultimate destiny) the Lord.
World, the game of dice

verse.gurmukhi: gur isK suix gurisK isK sdwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਸੁਣਿ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸਿਖ ਸਦਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Having listened to the teaching of Guru,

transliteration.english: gur sikh sun gursikh sikh sadhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर सिख सुणि गुरसिख सिख सदाइआ।
transliteration.en: gur sikh sun gursikh sikh sadhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर सिख सुणि गुरसिख सिख सदाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr sɪkʰ sʊɳ Gʊrəsɪkʰ sɪkʰ səd̪ɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر سکھ سُݨ گُرسکھ سکھ سداایا۔

en.bdb: The Sikh of Guru has called other Sikhs.

verse.gurmukhi: gurisK suix kir Bwau mMin vswieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸੁਣਿ ਕਰਿ ਭਾਉ ਮੰਨਿ ਵਸਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Adopting the teachings of the Guru,

transliteration.english: gursikh sun kar bhaau ma(n)n vasaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरसिख सुणि करि भाउ मंनि वसाइआ।
transliteration.en: gursikh sun kar bhaau ma(n)n vasaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरसिख सुणि करि भाउ मंनि वसाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəsɪkʰ sʊɳ kər ɓɑo məŋn ʋəsɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرسکھ سُݨ کر بھاا منّ وساایا۔

en.bdb: The Sikh has recited the same to others.
The Sikhs of the Guru have liked the Sikhs and thus a Sikh has met the Sikhs.

verse.gurmukhi: caupiV solh swr jug ijix AwieAw ]18]
verse.unicode: ਚਉਪੜਿ ਸੋਲਹ ਸਾਰ ਜੁਗ ਜਿਣਿ ਆਇਆ ॥੧੮॥

en.bdb: The pair of the Guru and the disciple has conquered the world-game of oblong dice.

transliteration.english: chaupaR soleh saar jug jin aaiaa ||18||
transliteration.hindi: चउपड़ि सोलह सार जुग जिणि आइआ ॥१८॥
transliteration.en: chaupaR soleh saar jug jin aaiaa ||18||
transliteration.hi: चउपड़ि सोलह सार जुग जिणि आइआ ॥१८॥
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃoʊpəɽ sɔləh sɑr d͡ʒʊG d͡ʒɪɳ əɑɪɑ.1ə8.
transliteration.ur: چاپڑ سوله سار جُگ جݨ آایا ۔۔۱۸۔۔

en.bdb: The game of chess
The chess players have spread the chess mat.
Elephants, chariots, horses and pedestrians have been brought in.

verse.gurmukhi: huie piqswhu vjIr duie dl CwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਹੁਇ ਪਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਵਜੀਰ ਦੁਇ ਦਲ ਛਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The groups of kings and ministers have gathered and are fighting tooth and nail.

transliteration.english: hui patisaahu vajeer dhui dhal chhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: हुइ पतिसाहु वजीर दुइ दल छाइआ।
transliteration.en: hui patisaahu vajeer dhui dhal chhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: हुइ पतिसाहु वजीर दुइ दल छाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: hʊeɪ pət̪ɪsɑh ʋəd͡ʒir d̪ʊeɪ d̪əl ɕɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: هُا پتساهُ وجیِر دُا دل چھاایا۔

en.bdb: The groups of kings and ministers have gathered and are fighting tooth and nail.
The Gurmukh by making a move has opened his heart before the Guru.
The Guru has lifted pedestrian to the rank of minister and has placed him in the palace of success (and thus has saved the life game of the disciple).
Living in the fear of God, Gurmukhs attain formless God

verse.gurmukhi: BY ivic inmix inim BY ivc jwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਨਿਮਣਿ ਨਿਮਿ ਭੈ ਵਿਚ ਜਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Under the natural law (fear of lord), the jiva (creature) is conceived (by mother) and in the fear (law) he is born.

transliteration.english: bhai vich niman nim bhai vich jaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: भै विचि निमणि निमि भै विच जाइआ।
transliteration.en: bhai vich niman nim bhai vich jaiaa|
transliteration.hi: भै विचि निमणि निमि भै विच जाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɓæ ʋɪt͡ʃ nɪməɳ nɪm ɓæ ʋɪt͡ʃ d͡ʒɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: بھَے وچ نمݨ نمِ بھَے وچ جاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: BY ivic gurmuiK pMiQ srxI AwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥਿ ਸਰਣੀ ਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: In fear he comes in the shelter of the way (panth) of Guru.

transliteration.english: bhai vich gurmukh pa(n)th saranee aaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: भै विचि गुरमुखि पंथि सरणी आइआ।
transliteration.en: bhai vich gurmukh pa(n)th saranee aaiaa|
transliteration.hi: भै विचि गुरमुखि पंथि सरणी आइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɓæ ʋɪt͡ʃ Gʊrəmʊkʰ pəŋt̪ʰ sərəɳi əɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: بھَے وچ گُرمکھ پںتھ سرݨیِ آایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: BY ivic sMgiq swD sbdu kmwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਾਧ ਸਬਦੁ ਕਮਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: In fear while in the holy congregation he earns the merit of the True Word

transliteration.english: bhai vich sa(n)gat saadh sabadh kamaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: भै विचि संगति साध सबदु कमाइआ।
transliteration.en: bhai vich sa(n)gat saadh sabadh kamaiaa|
transliteration.hi: भै विचि संगति साध सबदु कमाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɓæ ʋɪt͡ʃ səŋGət̪ sɑt̪ə̀ səbəd̪ kəmɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: بھَے وچ سںگت سادھ سبد کماایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: BY ivic jIvnu mukiq Bwxw BwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਜੀਵਨੁ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਭਾਣਾ ਭਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: In fear (natural laws) he gets liberated in life and accepts the will of God happily.

transliteration.english: bhai vich jeevan mukat bhaanaa bhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: भै विचि जीवनु मुकति भाणा भाइआ।
transliteration.en: bhai vich jeevan mukat bhaanaa bhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: भै विचि जीवनु मुकति भाणा भाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɓæ ʋɪt͡ʃ d͡ʒiʋən mʊkət̪ ɓɑɳɑ ɓɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: بھَے وچ جیِون مُکت بھاݨا بھاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: BY ivic jnmu svwir shij smwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਜਨਮੁ ਸਵਾਰਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਸਮਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: In fear he leaves away this life and merges in equipoise.

transliteration.english: bhai vich janam savaar sahaj samaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: भै विचि जनमु सवारि सहजि समाइआ।
transliteration.en: bhai vich janam savaar sahaj samaiaa|
transliteration.hi: भै विचि जनमु सवारि सहजि समाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɓæ ʋɪt͡ʃ d͡ʒənəm səʋɑr səhəd͡ʒ səmɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: بھَے وچ جنم سوار سهجِ سماایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: BY ivic inj Gir jwie pUrw pwieAw ]20]
verse.unicode: ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਜਾਇ ਪੂਰਾ ਪਾਇਆ ॥੨੦॥

en.bdb: In fear he settles in his self and attains the supreme Perfect Being.

transliteration.english: bhai vich nij ghar jai pooraa paiaa ||20||
transliteration.hindi: भै विचि निज घरि जाइ पूरा पाइआ ॥२०॥
transliteration.en: bhai vich nij ghar jai pooraa paiaa ||20||
transliteration.hi: भै विचि निज घरि जाइ पूरा पाइआ ॥२०॥
transliteration.ipa: ɓæ ʋɪt͡ʃ nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər d͡ʒɑeɪ purɑ pɑɪɑ.2ə0.
transliteration.ur: بھَے وچ نج گھرِ جاا پُورا پاایا ۔۔۲۰۔۔

en.bdb: In praise of the Guru
Those who, accepting Guru as God have sought shelter in the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: gur crxI icqu lwie n clY clwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਚਰਣੀ ਚਿਤੁ ਲਾਇ ਨ ਚਲੈ ਚਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Those who have put their heart at the feet of Lord, never become perishable.

transliteration.english: gur charanee chit lai na chalai chalaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर चरणी चितु लाइ न चलै चलाइआ।
transliteration.en: gur charanee chit lai na chalai chalaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर चरणी चितु लाइ न चलै चलाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr t͡ʃərəɳi t͡ʃɪt̪ lɑeɪ nə t͡ʃəlæ t͡ʃəlɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر چرݨیِ چت لاا ن چلَے چلاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmiq inhcl hoie inj pdu pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਹੋਇ ਨਿਜ ਪਦੁ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: They, getting deeply rooted in the wisdom of Guru, attain themselves.

transliteration.english: gurmat nihachal hoi nij padh paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमति निहचल होइ निज पदु पाइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmat nihachal hoi nij padh paiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमति निहचल होइ निज पदु पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmət̪ nɪhət͡ʃəl hɔeɪ nɪd͡ʒ pəd̪ pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمت نهچل هوا نج پد پاایا۔

en.bdb: They adopt the daily routine of the Gurmukhs, and Gods Will becomes dear to them.
As Gurmukhs, losing their ego, they merge in the truth.

verse.gurmukhi: sPlu jnmu jig Awie jgqu qrwieAw ]21]20[
verse.unicode: ਸਫਲੁ ਜਨਮੁ ਜਗਿ ਆਇ ਜਗਤੁ ਤਰਾਇਆ ॥੨੧॥੨੦।

en.bdb: Their birth in the world is meaningful and they across the whole world also.

transliteration.english: safal janam jag aai jagat taraiaa ||21||20|
transliteration.hindi: सफलु जनमु जगि आइ जगतु तराइआ ॥२१॥२०।
transliteration.en: safal janam jag aai jagat taraiaa ||21||20|
transliteration.hi: सफलु जनमु जगि आइ जगतु तराइआ ॥२१॥२०।
transliteration.ipa: səfəl d͡ʒənəm d͡ʒəG əɑeɪ d͡ʒəGət̪ t̪ərɑɪɑ.2ə1.2ə0.
transliteration.ur: سپھل جنم جگ آا جگت تراایا ۔۔۲۱۔۔۲۰۔
